faq.title: ‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Pl4to acts as a GPS for your finances. You enter your accounts, your recurring budget, and the app automatically calculates your financial trajectory over multiple years.
faq.a2: Absolutely! Your data is encrypted and stored securely. We never have access to your banking credentials. You manually enter your information.
faq.q3: Can I access Pl4to on multiple devices?
faq.a3: Yes! With the Essential plan, your data is automatically synchronized across all your devices.
faq.q4: How do I modify a recurring transaction?
faq.a4: Go to 'My Budget', click on the bubble of the transaction you want to modify, then use the form to adjust the details.
faq.a5: Biweekly means 'every two weeks' (26 times per year). For example, if you get paid every other Friday, that's a biweekly frequency.
faq.q6: Why is my projected balance different from my actual balance?
faq.a6: Pl4to projects based on your planned budget. If you have unplanned expenses, adjust your current balance in 'My Accounts' to recalibrate projections.
faq.q7: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.a7: You can cancel anytime in Settings > Subscription. Your data remains accessible until the end of the paid period.
faq.a8: Pl4to is a visualization and planning tool. We do not provide personalized financial advice. For advice, consult a certified professional.
